name: Skullhammer
description:
The main character, a skeleton without a name, has been imprisoned inside of the haunted dungeons. Neither him nor you know how it's happened, but you need to help that guy find a way out!

But you have to be careful, because the dungeons are full of scary creatures and frightening ghosts.

The game is really short and simple.

It has some small easter eggs and I hope some of you might feel that nostalgia to oldschool retro games.

The game was created in ten days for the Crazy Compo #2 jam/competition. First version has been released on the 16th of June, 2013.

Created with Multimedia Fusion 2.

Arrow keys
Space
Ctrl Move
Jump
Use the hammer

A game by Sebastian 'creesee' Olszowski

with artwork by Karol Belina
